reviewText:
This is an erotic movie without erotic scenes, what a nonsense.
All the erotic Scenes are cutted or completely deleted.
I don't understand this. Try to get the unrated version!

I remember seeing this movie some years ago and decided to buy it.  This is the rated version that seems to have most of the sex scenes edited.  If you want this movie, try to get the unrated version.

i bought this, expecting to watch what id seen on pay cable-a sexy, soft core movie.  this movie was edited to point where any hint of nudity quickly shifted to the end of the scene.  kinda pointless, when the whole plot of the movie is showing off its actors having (soft core) sex.  im returning my copy, and will be out of the shipping charges, but i think anyone interested in buying this movie should be warned.  there was no information on the cover that this was a tainted version. this is blatant misrepresentation, and should be addressed.
